animations.name: Jelly Bounce
animations.description: A playful bounce effect that makes buttons feel tactile and fun

prompts.beginner: Make my button bounce like jelly when I hover over it. It should feel soft, playful, and satisfying - like poking a gummy bear. The bounce should be quick but noticeable.
prompts.pro:
Create a hover effect using Framer Motion spring physics:
- type: 'spring'
- stiffness: 400 (controls snap speed)
- damping: 10 (controls oscillation)
- Scale to 1.05 on hover
- Use whileHover for state management

animations.name: Shimmer Stroke
animations.description: An elegant light sweep effect along the border that adds premium feel

prompts.beginner: Add a shiny light effect that travels around the border of my button when someone hovers over it. It should look premium and smooth, like light reflecting off a polished surface.
prompts.pro:
Implement a conic-gradient border animation:
- Use pseudo-element with conic-gradient
- Animate rotation on hover
- Mask inner content to create border effect
- Duration: 1.5s linear infinite
- Consider using CSS @property for gradient animation

animations.name: Magnetic Hover
animations.description: Button subtly follows the cursor position within its bounds

prompts.beginner: Make my button magically follow my cursor when I hover near it, like it's attracted to my mouse. It should feel smooth and subtle, not jumpy.
prompts.pro:
Track mouse position relative to button center:
- Calculate offset from center on mousemove
- Apply transform with dampened values (strength: 0.3)
- Use spring animation for smooth return
- Reset position on mouseleave
- Consider using useMotionValue for performance

animations.name: Toast Slide In
animations.description: Smooth entry and exit for notification toasts with stacking support

prompts.beginner: Create a notification that slides in smoothly from the right side of the screen, stays for a moment, then slides back out. If there are multiple notifications, they should stack nicely.

animations.name: Search Expand
animations.description: Search input that elegantly expands on focus

prompts.beginner: Create a search bar that starts as a small icon button, then smoothly expands into a full input field when I click on it. It should feel fluid and natural.
prompts.pro:
Animate width with layout animation:
- Collapsed: icon-only (44px)
- Expanded: full width (300px)
- Use layoutId for smooth morphing
- Animate placeholder opacity
- Auto-focus input on expand

animations.name: Progress Fill
animations.description: Smooth animated progress bar with optional shimmer effect

prompts.beginner: Create a progress bar that fills up smoothly from left to right. Add a shiny effect that moves across it to make it feel alive and premium.
prompts.pro:
Combine width animation with shimmer overlay:
- Animate width from 0% to target
- Use spring physics for natural feel
- Overlay pseudo-element with gradient
- Animate gradient position: -100% to 100%

animations.name: Delayed Tooltip
animations.description: Tooltip that appears after a brief hover delay with smooth fade

prompts.beginner: Add a tooltip that appears when I hover over something, but only after waiting half a second. This way it won't pop up annoyingly when I'm just moving my mouse around.
prompts.pro:
Implement delayed tooltip with AnimatePresence:
- Track hover state with setTimeout
- Clear timeout on mouseleave
- Animate: opacity 0→1, y offset
- Use portal for proper stacking
- Consider useFloating for positioning

animations.name: Card Swipe
animations.description: Tinder-style swipe gesture for card dismissal

prompts.beginner: Create a card that I can swipe left or right to dismiss, like Tinder. It should rotate slightly as I drag and fly off the screen when I let go.
prompts.pro:
Implement drag gesture with rotation:
- Use drag="x" constraint
- Map dragX to rotation (max 15deg)
- Detect swipe direction on dragEnd
- Animate exit based on velocity
- Use useMotionValue for derived values

animations.name: Text Hover Pop
animations.description: Individual characters pop up on hover for playful interaction

prompts.beginner: Make each letter in my text jump up when I hover over it, like they're excited to be touched. The letters near my cursor should react too, creating a wave effect.
prompts.pro:
Split text into spans, track hover per character:
- Map text to individual motion.span
- whileHover: { y: -8 }
- Use spring transition
- Optional: affect neighboring characters
- Consider performance with many characters

animations.name: Name Tag Reveal
animations.description: Hover over avatar to reveal name with smooth slide animation

prompts.beginner: When I hover over a user's profile picture, smoothly reveal their name tag sliding out from behind the avatar. It should feel like peeking behind a curtain.
prompts.pro:
Use clipPath or width animation:
- Container with overflow hidden
- Name tag positioned adjacent
- Animate width from 0 to auto
- Or use clipPath: inset(0 100% 0 0) → inset(0)
- Stagger avatar scale with name reveal

animations.name: Pulse Ring
animations.description: Animated rings pulsing outward from a center point, perfect for status indicators

prompts.beginner: Create a pulsing ring effect that radiates outward from a central dot, like ripples in water. Great for showing an active status or drawing attention to a location.
prompts.pro:
Implement pulse rings with staggered animations:
- Multiple ring elements with scale animation
- Stagger delay based on ring index
- Animate scale 1→4 with opacity 0.8→0
- Use repeat: Infinity for continuous pulse

animations.name: 3D Flip Card
animations.description: A card that flips to reveal content on the back, using 3D perspective transforms

prompts.beginner: Create a card that flips over when I hover on it, revealing different content on the back. It should flip smoothly like a playing card with a 3D effect.
prompts.pro:
Implement 3D card flip with CSS perspective:
- Container with perspective: 1000px
- Inner element with transform-style: preserve-3d
- Front/back faces with backface-visibility: hidden
- Animate rotateY (or rotateX) from 0 to 180deg
- Back face pre-rotated 180deg

animations.name: Typewriter Effect
animations.description: Text types itself out character by character with a blinking cursor

prompts.beginner: Make my text appear as if someone is typing it out, one character at a time, with a blinking cursor at the end. It should feel like watching someone type in real-time.
prompts.pro:
Implement typewriter effect with state management:
- Track current character index with useState
- Use setTimeout/setInterval for character timing
- Animate cursor blink with CSS or motion
- Optional: delete and retype for loop mode
- Consider varying speed for natural feel

animations.name: Floating Label Input
animations.description: Input field where the placeholder floats up to become a label on focus

prompts.beginner: Create an input field where the placeholder text smoothly floats up and becomes a label when I click on the input. It should look modern and clean like Material Design.
prompts.pro:
Implement floating label with conditional animation:
- Track focus and value states
- Label position: absolute, animates y and scale
- Condition: float if focused OR has value
- Animate color change on focus
- Optional: underline animation on focus

animations.name: Slide Toggle
animations.description: iOS-style toggle switch with smooth spring animation

prompts.beginner: Create a toggle switch like the ones on iOS. When I tap it, the knob should slide smoothly from one side to the other and the background color should change.
prompts.pro:
Implement toggle with spring layout animation:
- Track boolean state
- Animate knob position with spring physics
- Transition background color on state change
- Use layoutId or x position animation
- Add whileTap scale for tactile feedback

animations.name: Skeleton Loader
animations.description: Loading placeholder with shimmer animation

prompts.beginner: Create a skeleton loading placeholder that shows a shimmering effect while content is loading, like you see on Facebook or LinkedIn.
prompts.pro:
Implement skeleton loader with infinite shimmer:
- Create base element with configurable dimensions
- Animate gradient overlay from left to right
- Use x translate animation with infinite repeat
- Support different shapes (rectangle, circle)
- Add Demo wrapper showing card-like layout

animations.name: Accordion Collapse
animations.description: Expandable sections with smooth height animation

prompts.beginner: Create an accordion component where clicking on a section header expands its content smoothly, and clicking again collapses it.
prompts.pro:
Implement accordion with AnimatePresence:
- Track open items in state array
- Use AnimatePresence for enter/exit animations
- Animate height from 0 to 'auto' with overflow hidden
- Rotate chevron icon based on open state
- Support single or multiple open sections

animations.name: Ripple Button
animations.description: Material Design ripple effect on click

prompts.beginner: Create a button that shows a ripple effect expanding from where you click, like Material Design buttons.
prompts.pro:
Implement ripple effect with dynamic positioning:
- Track click coordinates relative to button
- Create ripple element at click position
- Animate scale from 0 to full size covering button
- Fade out ripple opacity during expansion
- Use AnimatePresence to cleanup ripples after animation

animations.name: Count Up
animations.description: Animated number counting effect

prompts.beginner: Create a number that counts up from 0 to a target value when it comes into view, like statistics on websites.
prompts.pro:
Implement count-up with scroll trigger:
- Use useInView hook to detect visibility
- Animate number using requestAnimationFrame
- Apply easing function for smooth progression
- Support prefix, suffix, and decimal places
- Trigger animation once when scrolled into view

animations.name: Parallax Card
animations.description: 3D tilt effect following mouse movement

prompts.beginner: Create a card that tilts in 3D following the mouse cursor, with a glare effect like a holographic card.
prompts.pro:
Implement 3D parallax card:
- Track mouse position relative to card center
- Calculate rotateX and rotateY based on mouse offset
- Apply perspective transform with spring animation
- Add glare overlay positioned at mouse location
- Reset rotation smoothly on mouse leave

animations.name: Gradient Text
animations.description: Text with a continuously flowing color gradient background

prompts.beginner: Create a headline where the text color is actually a moving rainbow gradient. It should flow smoothly from left to right forever.
prompts.pro:
Implement gradient text:
- bg-clip-text + text-transparent
- background-size: 200%
- Animate background-position using Motion
- Linear easing, infinite loop

animations.name: Spotlight Card
animations.description: Card with a mouse-following radial gradient spotlight

prompts.beginner: Create a card where a soft light follows my mouse cursor as I move over it, revealing the background texture or just adding a cool glow.
prompts.pro:
Track mouse position on container:
- onMouseMove to get coordinates
- Update MotionValues
- Use useMotionTemplate for radial-gradient(circle at x y, ...)
- Apply as background to overlay div

animations.name: Border Beam
animations.description: A glowing beam of light that travels along the border of the container

prompts.beginner: Make a cool neon light travel around the border of my card. It should look like energy flowing through a wire.
prompts.pro:
Create border beam with conic gradient rotation:
- Parent with relative positioning
- Absolute child with large conic-gradient
- Rotate child 360deg infinitely
- Mask or overlay to show only border area
- Use mask-composite for calculating border path (advanced)

animations.name: Staggered Menu
animations.description: Menu items animate in sequentially for a smooth visual flow

prompts.beginner: Create a vertical menu where the items don't just appear all at once, but slide in one after another from the left. It feels much smoother and more polite.

animations.name: Text Reveal
animations.description: Text elegantly slides up from a masked container

prompts.beginner: Make my text slide up into view from nothing, like it's coming out of an invisible box. It looks very clean and professional for headlines.
prompts.pro:
Use overflow: hidden parent with y-transform child:
- Parent div with overflow-hidden
- Child motion.div starts at y: '100%'
- Animate to y: 0
- Use ease: [0.33, 1, 0.68, 1] for premium feel

animations.name: Aurora Background
animations.description: Ethereal northern lights effect with animated colorful blobs

prompts.beginner: Create a beautiful aurora borealis background effect with colorful moving lights, like the northern lights in the sky. Perfect for hero sections.
prompts.pro:
Implement aurora background with multiple animated blobs:
- 3+ radial-gradient circles with blur filter
- Animate position, scale with different durations
- Use mix-blend-mode for color blending
- Container with overflow: hidden

animations.name: Grid Pattern
animations.description: Clean grid lines background with radial fade effect

prompts.beginner: Create a subtle grid pattern background like you see on modern tech websites. The lines should fade out towards the edges.
prompts.pro:
Implement grid pattern with CSS:
- Use linear-gradient for horizontal and vertical lines
- backgroundSize controls grid spacing
- Add radial-gradient overlay for edge fade
- Adjust opacity for subtlety

animations.name: Dot Pattern
animations.description: Minimalist dot matrix background with fade effect

prompts.beginner: Create a dot pattern background with evenly spaced dots that fade out towards the edges. Very clean and modern looking.
prompts.pro:
Implement dot pattern with CSS:
- Use radial-gradient for dots
- backgroundSize controls spacing
- Add radial-gradient overlay for vignette
- Adjust dot size within gradient
